mapper.select: select * from DesignWaitingList ORDER BY priority ASC

SELECT dwl.priority, dwl.dw_seq, dwl.start_date, dwl.end_date as end_date, dwl.proj_name, m.name, dwl.progress FROM DesignWaitingList dwl JOIN DWLMember dwlm ON dwl.dw_seq = dwlm.dw_seq JOIN Member m ON dwlm.m_num = m.m_num ORDER BY dwl.priority ASC
SELECT dwl.dw_seq, m.m_num FROM DesignWaitingList dwl JOIN DWLMember dwlm ON dwl.dw_seq = dwlm.dw_seq JOIN Member m ON dwlm.m_num = m.m_num where dwl.dw_seq = #{dw_seq}
mapper.insert: insert into DesignWaitingList (proj_name, start_date, end_date, priority, progress) values (#{proj_name}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, #{priority}, #{progress})
